title: Simple Article
content: Hello world. This is a test.

title: Multi-Paragraph Article
content:
First paragraph with multiple sentences. It has several words.

Second paragraph starts here. It continues the story.

title: Complex Text Analysis
content:
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The dog was very lazy indeed.

The fox was quick and brown. It jumped over everything.

Punctuation, hyphenated-words, and special cases are important!

title: Repeated Words
content: JavaScript is great. JavaScript is powerful. JavaScript is amazing. JavaScript developers love JavaScript.
